loadingInfo.label: Show load alert message
loadingInfo.helpText:
When you turn on Show loading info, a loading info prompt will be displayed at the top every time the page loads："CodeforcesBetter -- xxx"

This is used to see how the script is currently workingIf you don't want to see it, you can choose to Off

It is important to note that if you need feedback on any loading issues with the script, please turn this option on before taking a screenshot to make it easier to analyze the issue

targetArea.label: Display target area range
targetArea.helpText: When turned on, the range of its target area is displayed when the mouse is hovered over the MD View/Copy/Translate button.

renderOptimization.label: Folding block rendering optimization
renderOptimization.helpText:
Add contain constraints to folded block elements

contain: layout style;

If your browser lags when viewing large numbers of folded blocks, turning it onmayimprove it somewhat

paging.label: Comment Pagination
paging.helpText: Pagination of comments shows the specified number ofmain floor per page.

luoguJump.label: Show jump to Luogu
luoguJump.helpText:
Some Codeforces questions are included on Luogu Oj. Some questions have translations and solutions.

After turning on the display, if the current question is included, the Luogu logo will be displayed in the upper right corner of the question.

Click to jump with one click. Go to the corresponding page of Luogu for this question.

recolor.label: Recolor list
recolor.helpText:
For the competition list using the Codeforces format

Re-color the gradient according to the range of "score/total score"

Range：1~0.7~0.45~0 Dark green → light orange → dark orange → red

openai.name: ChatGPT Translation
openai.helpText:
You need to add and select the configuration information you want to use in the ChatGPT configuration below. You can modify and delete the configuration by right-clicking

Please read the introduction on the script page

autoTranslation.title: Automatically translate
autoTranslation.helpText:
For short texts in the.ttypography, .comments area

are automatically translated when they enter the visible area of the browser window

shortTextLength.name: short text length
shortTextLength.helpText: When the text length is less than this value, it is considered as a short text

allowMixTrans.name: Mixed translation of the comments section
allowMixTrans.helpText:
When translating automatically, for each short text area in the comments section, independently and randomly select one of the services checked below

Translate in parallel

mode.name: Operating mode
mode.helpText:
You can choose how the script works

○ Normal mode：will translate the whole area at once

○ Segment Mode：will translate each<p/>and<i/>tag in the area in turn

○ Selection Mode：You are free to click on any<p/>and<i/>tags on the page to translate them

Note：Segmented/Selection segmented modes cause the following problems：

- they make it impossible for the translation interface to know the whole text in context and reduce the quality of the translation.

- There will besections that will not be translated/cannot be selectedbecause they are not<p/>or<i/>elements

memory.name: Automatic recovery of historical translations
memory.helpText:
Automatically saves the translation information on thetitle pageto the local indexDB

Automatically restores the translation information when refreshing/next entering the page

retrans.name: When retranslating
retrans.helpText: Choose whether to 'Close old results' or 'Collapse old results' when retranslating

transWaitTime.name: Waiting Interval
transWaitTime.helpText:
Sets the waiting interval between two translation requests, this setting takes effect globally and is calculated independently for each translation service

Recommendation 200 + milliseconds

Description：ChatGPT translations ignore this setting and do not wait

replaceSymbol.name: LaTeX Replacement
replaceSymbol.helpText:
The script ensures that all LaTeX formulas are extracted and placeholder symbols are used to prevent them from being disrupted by translation interfaces.

For different translation services, the probability of the placeholder symbols themselves being disrupted varies. Please refer to the instructions on the script page for details.

Note: This option does not apply when translating with ChatGPT, so it is not affected by this option.

You can find more information in the instructions on the script page.

filterTextWithoutEmphasis.name: Filtering of ** symbols in text
filterTextWithoutEmphasis.helpText:
Some translation services (such as DeepL) mishandle the emphasis symbol in Markdown **

This may cause the translated result to omit the wrapped content. You can choose to remove the emphasis symbol (this will be ignored when using ChatGPT)

basics.name: Basic
basics.notice: Note：The credentials required to work on different pages vary, see the labeled descriptions of the corresponding options.

contest.name: Contest ProblemSet Page
contest.helpText:
Data source clist.by

You need to provide the official API key

or keep clist.by logged in on your browser (i.e. cookie is valid)

problem.name: Title Page
problem.helpText:
You'll need to provide the official api key

or leave clist.by on your browser logged in (i.e. cookie is valid)

problemset.name: Problemset Page
problemset.helpText: Need to keep clist.by logged in (i.e. cookie active) on your browser for this to work

spoilerProtection.title: Spoiler-proof
spoilerProtection.helpText: Displayed only when the mouse is moved over the Rating sub-display area

problemPageCodeEditor.label: Add editor to problem page
problemPageCodeEditor.helpText: Add Monaco editor below the problem page and the code will be saved automatically, providing online code running

isCodeSubmitConfirm.label: Secondary confirmation of code submission
isCodeSubmitConfirm.helpText: Clicking on the problem page of the Monaco editor will cause a pop-up window to confirm code submission twice, preventing incorrect submissions.

alwaysConsumeMouseWheel.label: Mouse scroll lock
alwaysConsumeMouseWheel.helpText: When turned on, when the mouse pointer is inside the monaco editor, mouse scrolling will only scroll the content inside the editor

useLSP.label: Use LSP
useLSP.helpText:
Connect to LSP Server to enable code completion, code diagnostics, formatting, go to definitions, etc.

Support for C++, Python languages

You will need to start OJBetter_Bridge, as described on the scripts page

OJBetter_Bridge_WorkUri.label: Working Directory
OJBetter_Bridge_WorkUri.helpText:
You need to fill in the path where OJBetter_Bridge is located

Use either forward slash or backslash

Default path：

C:/OJBetter_Bridge

OJBetter_Bridge_SocketUrl.label: Server.
OJBetter_Bridge_SocketUrl.helpText:
You need to fill in the Server URL of OJBetter_Bridge in your local machine

Default URL:

ws://127.0.0.1:2323/

Note that you usually don't need to change it here, if you need to change it, please be consistent with the default URL format

staticCompletionEnhancement.title: Static Completion Enhancement
staticCompletionEnhancement.performanceWarning: Note：Too many static complementary rules can affect performance

loaded.label: No waiting for page resources to load
loaded.helpText:
To prevent unexpected errors from executing scripts before the page resources have finished loading (mainly various js), scripts wait for the window.onload event by default

If the loading message at the top of your page always stays at："Waiting for page resources to load" even though the page has already finished loading

you should first check to see if whether it is a network problem,

if not, it may be due to the window.onload event being triggered too early in your browser (before DOMContentLoaded),

you can try to turn on this option to stop waiting for the window.onload event

Note：if you don't have any of the above problems, please don't turn on this option
